test.test_name: IR detail link must contain aria-labels
test.query_clob:
with aapi as (select lower(trim(detail_link_attributes))||detail_link_text src,
                  page_id,
                  application_id,
                  region_name,
                  detail_link_attributes,
                  detail_link_target,
                  detail_link_text,
                  region_id,
                  created_by,
                  created_on,
                  updated_by,
                  updated_on,
							    workspace
             from apex_application_page_ir aa
             where detail_link_target is not null)
select case  when (src not like '%aria-label%'
                   or src is null ) 
             then 'N' 
             else 'Y'
             end pass_yn,             
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       aapi.created_by,
       aapi.created_on,
       aapi.updated_by last_updated_by,
       aapi.updated_on last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report `%0` (app %1, page %2) detail link is missing an aria-label', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('IR `%0` detail link is missing an aria-label (app %1, page %2, region id %3)', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
				p3 => aapi.region_id) issue_title,
       aapi.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.region_name,
       aapi.src,
			 aapi.workspace
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
Links must have aria-labels so that screen-readers can correctly identify their purpose.

Note: There is debate about whether the addition of a `title` tag is beneficial.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  2.4.4(A) : Link Purpose (In Context) :  
    The purpose of each link can be determined from the link text alone or from the link text together with its programmatically determined link context, except where the purpose of the link would be ambiguous to users in general.
